00010 from pyre.components.Component import Component
00011 from molDynamics.gulp.potentials.MorseGulp import MorseGulp
00012 from molDynamics.gulp.potentials.LennardJonesABGulp import LennardJonesABGulp
00013 from molDynamics.gulp.potentials.ThreeBodyGulp import ThreeBodyGulp  
00014 from molDynamics.gulp.potentials.TorsionGulp import TorsionGulp 
00015 
00016 class UreaForcefield(Component):
00017     '''Contains the potentials for urea'''
00018 
00019     class Inventory(Component.Inventory):
00020         import pyre.inventory as inv
00021         CAndOBond = inv.facility('C and O Bond', default=MorseGulp('C', 'O'))
00022         CAndNBond = inv.facility('C and N Bond', default=MorseGulp('C', 'N'))
00023         HAndNBond = inv.facility('H and N Bond', default=MorseGulp('H', 'N'))
00024         CAndO = inv.facility('C and O Potential', default=LennardJonesABGulp('C', 'O'))
00025         CAndN = inv.facility('C and N Potential', default=LennardJonesABGulp('C', 'N'))
00026         OAndO = inv.facility('O and O Potential', default=LennardJonesABGulp('O', 'O'))
00027         NAndO = inv.facility('N and O Potential', default=LennardJonesABGulp('N', 'O'))
00028         NAndN = inv.facility('N and N Potential', default=LennardJonesABGulp('N', 'N'))
00029         CAndC = inv.facility('C and C Potential', default=LennardJonesABGulp('C', 'C'))
00030         NAndCAndO = inv.facility('N, C and O Potential', default=ThreeBodyGulp('N', 'C', 'O'))
00031         HAndNAndC = inv.facility('H, N, and C Potential', default=ThreeBodyGulp('H', 'N', 'C'))
00032         HAndNAndH = inv.facility('H, N, and H Potential', default=ThreeBodyGulp('H', 'N', 'H'))
00033         NAndCAndN = inv.facility('N, C, and N Potential', default=ThreeBodyGulp('N', 'C', 'N'))
00034         OAndCAndNAndH = inv.facility('O, C, N, and H Potential', default=TorsionGulp('O', 'C', 'N', 'H'))
00035         NAndCAndNAndH = inv.facility('N, C, N, and H Potential', default=TorsionGulp('N', 'C', 'N', 'H'))
00036         OAndCAndNAndN = inv.facility('O, C, N, and N Potential', default=TorsionGulp('O', 'C', 'N', 'N'))
00037 
00038     def __init__(self, name=None):
00039         if name is None:
00040             name = 'Urea Forcefield'
00041         Component.__init__(self, name, facility='facility')
00042         self.ii=self.inventory
00043         self.ii.CAndOBond.assignInteraction('morseGulpEx10')
00044         self.ii.CAndOBond.i.interIntra = 'intramolecular'
00045         self.ii.CAndNBond.assignInteraction('morseGulpEx10')
00046         self.ii.CAndNBond.i.interIntra = 'intramolecular'
00047         self.ii.HAndNBond.assignInteraction('morseGulpEx10')
00048         self.ii.HAndNBond.i.interIntra = 'intramolecular'
00049         self.ii.CAndO.assignInteraction('lennardGulpEx10')
00050         self.ii.CAndO.i.interIntra = 'intermolecular'
00051         self.ii.CAndN.assignInteraction('lennardGulpEx10')
00052         self.ii.CAndN.i.interIntra = 'intermolecular'
00053         self.ii.OAndO.assignInteraction('lennardGulpEx10')
00054         self.ii.OAndO.i.interIntra = 'intermolecular'
00055         self.ii.NAndO.assignInteraction('lennardGulpEx10')
00056         self.ii.NAndO.i.interIntra = 'intermolecular'
00057         self.ii.NAndN.assignInteraction('lennardGulpEx10')
00058         self.ii.NAndN.i.interIntra = 'intermolecular'
00059         self.ii.CAndC.assignInteraction('lennardGulpEx10')  
00060         self.ii.CAndC.i.interIntra = 'intermolecular'     
00061         self.ii.NAndCAndO.assignInteraction('threeBodyGulpEx10')
00062         self.ii.HAndNAndC.assignInteraction('threeBodyGulpEx10')
00063         self.ii.HAndNAndH.assignInteraction('threeBodyGulpEx10')
00064         self.ii.NAndCAndN.assignInteraction('threeBodyGulpEx10')
00065         self.ii.OAndCAndNAndH.assignInteraction('torsionGulpEx10')
00066         self.ii.NAndCAndNAndH.assignInteraction('torsionGulpEx10')
00067         self.ii.OAndCAndNAndN.assignInteraction('torsionGulpEx10')
00068 
00069     def writeGulp(self):
00070         '''writes out all the potentials in gulp format'''
00071         lines=self.ii.CAndOBond.write()\
00072         +self.ii.CAndNBond.write()\
00073         +self.ii.HAndNBond.write()\
00074         +self.ii.CAndO.write()\
00075         +self.ii.CAndN.write()\
00076         +self.ii.OAndO.write()\
00077         +self.ii.NAndO.write()\
00078         +self.ii.NAndN.write()\
00079         +self.ii.CAndC.write()\
00080         +self.ii.HAndNAndC.write()\
00081         +self.ii.HAndNAndH.write()\
00082         +self.ii.NAndCAndN.write()\
00083         +self.ii.OAndCAndNAndH.write()\
00084         +self.ii.NAndCAndNAndH.write()\
00085         +self.ii.OAndCAndNAndN.write()
00086         return lines
00087         
00088     def _defaults(self):
00089         Component._defaults(self)
00090         return
00091 
00092     def _configure(self):
00093         Component._configure(self)
00094         return
00095 
00096     def _init(self):
00097         Component._init(self)
00098         return
